message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with 3D semantic instance segmentation on point clouds using a convolutional neural network. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) category. The paper also introduces a novel loss function and attention-based k nearest neighbour, which involves learning embeddings and refining them, respectively. This suggests that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) categories. The use of graph convolutional networks and attention-based KNN also suggests that the paper may belong to the graphics (cs.GR) category. Finally, the paper involves semantic segmentation, which may also suggest that it belongs to the natural language processing (cs.CL) category.
